dataIdInfo.idAbs: Send an upload file to Places

tool.name: PushUploadToPlaces

param.name: upload
param.dialogReference: The full filename of an OSM change file. This file is typically created with the 'Creates a Places Upload File' tool. The file format is document on the OSM website. The changeset id must be "-1" - It will get replaced with the actually changeset id during the upload.
param.pythonReference: The full filename of an OSM change file. This file is typically created with the 'Creates a Places Upload File' tool. The file format is document on the OSM website. The changeset id must be "-1" - It will get replaced with the actually changeset id during the upload.

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: The workspace in which to create the upload log.
param.pythonReference: The workspace in which to create the upload log.

param.name: log_table
param.dialogReference: The name of the upload log. This table will document when and which features were uploaded to Places, and what thier Places id is.
param.pythonReference: The name of the upload log. This table will document when and which features were uploaded to Places, and what thier Places id is.

param.name: testing
param.displayname: Upload to the testing version of Places
param.dialogReference:
Which version of Places should the data be sent to?
  • Unchecked - Features will be sent to the Official version of Places.
  • Checked - Features will be sent to the test version of Places. They will not appear in Park Tiles. This is the default.
param.pythonReference:
Which version of Places should the data be sent to?
  • Unchecked - Features will be sent to the Official version of Places.
  • Checked - Features will be sent to the test version of Places. They will not appear in Park Tiles. This is the default.

tool.summary: Send an upload file to Places
tool.usage: Send an upload file to Places
